grandpa-demon-disable.name: Disable Grandpa Demon
grandpa-demon-disable.description: Disables the Grandpa Demon difficulty for the current Top 1 Demon (replaced with Infinite Demon instead).

infinite-demon-disable.name: Disable BG Effects
infinite-demon-disable.description: Removes the background effects for Legendary, Mythical, and Infinite Demon level pages.

particles-disable.name: Disable Particles
particles-disable.description: Removes particles from Legendary, Mythical, and Infinite Demon level pages.
